content:
{
  "name": "@mnrendra/obtain-tsconfig-paths",
  "version": "1.2.0",
  "description": "Obtain a valid baseUrl and paths from the compilerOptions in the tsconfig.json file",
  "private": false,
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rm -rf dist && npx rollup -c",
    "commit": "npx cz",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/mnrendra/obtain-tsconfig-paths.git"
  },
  "author": {
    "name": "Muhammad Rendra",
    "email": "mnrendra@users.noreply.github.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/mnrendra"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/mnrendra/obtain-tsconfig-paths/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/mnrendra/obtain-tsconfig-paths#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "@mnrendra/read-tsconfig": "^1.3.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@semantic-release/exec": "^6.0.3",
    "@semantic-release/git": "^10.0.1",
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.14",
    "@types/node": "^22.9.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.21.0",
    "clean-package": "^2.2.0",
    "cz-conventional-changelog": "^3.3.0",
    "eslint": "^8.57.1",
    "eslint-config-standard-with-typescript": "^43.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.31.0",
    "eslint-plugin-n": "^16.6.2",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^6.6.0",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "rollup": "^4.26.0",
    "rollup-plugin-dts": "^6.1.1",
    "rollup-plugin-esbuild": "^6.1.1",
    "semantic-release": "^24.2.0",
    "ts-jest": "^29.2.5",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.2",
    "typescript": "^5.6.3"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "obtain-tsconfig-paths",
    "obtain",
    "tsconfig",
    "paths"
  ]
}
